fields_of_interest: Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Youth, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
The organisation is primarily interested in entrepreneurial and creative learning across all education levels (formal and non formal) and linking to transversal skills such as digital and citizenship. Main themes include: 
Entrepreneurship Education 
Citizenship Education 
School Modernisation 
European Key Competences 
EntreComp 
New Skills Agenda 
Digital Europe 
ET2020 
Entrepreneurship2020 Action Plan
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Promotion of and support for entrepreneurial and creative life long learning
